column3: As you have no doubt noticed, the Starlight Celebration is in full swing. Would you like to join the festivities? Amh Garanjy is in Gridania looking for more little helpers!

You can leave trussing up the treants and recovering the stolen decorations to us. All you need to do is ride <Switch(PlayerParameter(71))><Case(1)>Kochab</Case><Case(2)><If(PlayerParameter(4))>Kochab<Else/>Polaris</If></Case><Case(3)>Pferkad</Case><Case(4)>Kochab</Case><Case(5)>Polaris</Case><Case(6)><If(PlayerParameter(4))>Kochab<Else/>Polaris</If></Case><Case(7)>Polaris</Case><Case(8)>Kochab</Case></Switch> and give those thieves a face full of starburst!

Would you like to hunt down some more decoration-pinching treants? <Switch(PlayerParameter(71))><Case(1)>Kochab</Case><Case(2)><If(PlayerParameter(4))>Kochab<Else/>Polaris</If></Case><Case(3)>Pferkad</Case><Case(4)>Kochab</Case><Case(5)>Polaris</Case><Case(6)><If(PlayerParameter(4))>Kochab<Else/>Polaris</If></Case><Case(7)>Polaris</Case><Case(8)>Kochab</Case></Switch> is ready to go!
